subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: The injury, to Lindsey Vonn’s anterior cruciate ligament in her right knee, the same ligament she tore in February, caused her to suspend her return to downhill skiing indefinitely.
snippet: The injury, to Lindsey Vonn’s anterior cruciate ligament in her right knee, the same ligament she tore in February, caused her to suspend her return to downhill skiing indefinitely.
